abstract: Morgan Stanley shareholders will vote Tuesday on a resolution that would give them a greater say in how the investment bank pays its top executives. The securities firm is just one of many companies facing such resolutions at their annual stockholder meetings; others include Bank of New York and Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley shareholders will vote Tuesday on a resolution that would give them a greater say in how the investment bank pays its top executives. The securities firm is just one of many companies facing such resolutions at their annual stockholder meetings; others include Bank of New York and Citigroup.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Shareholders to Vote on Pay Resolution
